name: Hoppy IWOlidays
description:
Try out our demo of Hoppy IWOlidays! 

NO SAVE/OR PAUSE STATES. As this is a small demo to also be in festive spirit there are currently no save states in this first version!

Join Niki the bunny on an epic quest  to save the  forest of Indiewood from a spooky Halloween night of darkness! 

In the light of the full moon, the Not-So-Evil Spirit has cast terrible spells, transforming this once peaceful forest into the corrupted woods you see before you. Graves have been opened,  ghosts haunt the grounds, and evil Jack-o-Lanterns have appeared. 

Help Niki muster her courage and  save Indiewood from this spooky fate!

  • A cute bunny to squeal with.
  • Shiny coins to collect.
  • Spooky family-friendly atmosphere.
  • Beautiful scenery.
  • Stuff to avoid & things to see.

This is demo is for Windows 64.

Download files come as zips so you will need WinRAR or 7Zip to extract the demo.

Once extracted, run the executable file to launch the demo.

NO SAVE/OR PAUSE STATES. In this first small demo sample there are no save or pause states currently.

Keyboard:

  • Space - Jump
  • WASD - Movement 
  • Esc - Main Menu (no pause)

Controller (does not work in menus for demo build):

  • A (Or Face Down) - Jump
  • Left Thumbstick (Movement)

Parts that will be added/tweaked in future builds:

  • NO SAVE/OR PAUSE STATES (yet as it is a small demo).
  • No volume control in game yet.
  • Sometimes bunny spawns in slow.

Follow us to keep up to date on development.

  

Brought to you by the team behind IWOCon (a FREE digital indie con).
